code: import reducer from'../reducers/index';import index1 from'../action/index1';import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';var initialiseSagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var storeEnhancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducer,storeEnhancer(applyMiddleware(initialiseSagaMiddleware)));initialiseSagaMiddleware.run(index1);export default store;
